meanings.sent1: In Honduras, people use lempiras to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for lempiras at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The lempiras in my wallet were having a party!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a handful of shiny lempiras.
meanings.sent5: The sound of lempiras jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Honduras.
meanings.sent1: How many lempiras do you need to pay for the meal?
meanings.sent2: The price of the item was listed in lempiras.
meanings.sent3: The lempiras in the piggy bank were planning an escape.
meanings.sent4: His words were worth more than a thousand lempiras.
meanings.sent5: The colorful lempiras brightened up the vendor's stall.
